name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Last of Us Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Join Joel and Ellie in a rainy world of survival with vivid visuals and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience the gripping journey of Joel and Ellie in a post-apocalyptic world, where rain falls and danger looms in every corner.

🎨 Atmospheric Design: A moody and cinematic interface reflecting the intensity of their adventure, with Joel and Ellie navigating a ruined world.
⏰ Clock and Date: Keep track of time as you immerse yourself in this world of survival and resilience.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Access your favorite sites and resources swiftly while living the post-apocalyptic story.
🎮 Play Games: Relive the thrill of survival with related browser-based games inspired by the series.
Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with the engine selected by the user.
🚀 More Extension: Add additional features and immersive elements from the The Last of Us universe to enrich your browsing experience.
